actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1343.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 12163, a bill to authorize appropriations to the Department of Energy in accordance with section 261 of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, section 305 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974, and section 660 of the Department of Energy Reorganization Act, for energy research and development, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 12163 (Department of Energy authorization).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 12163, a bill to authorize appropriations to the Department of Energy in accordance with section 261 of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, section 305 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974, and section 660 of the Department of Energy Reorganization Act, for energy research and development, and for other purposes.
